verses.content: Hienghai hi an pahnam upahai chu an nih, Artazerzia rorêl laia Babulona inthawka keia ruola hang fe vehai phung sûtna chu hi hi a nih.
Phinehas naupahaia chun Ger- som; Ithamar naupahaia chun Daniel; David naupahaia chun, Hattus;
Paros naupahaia, Sekania nau- pahaia chun, Zekaria; phung sût dâna chun, ama leh pasal za khat le sâwmnga an nih.
Pahath-moab naupahaia chun, Zerahia naupa Eliehoenai; ama le pasal za hni leh.
Jahaziel naupa, Sekania naupa- haia chun, ama leh pasal za thum.
Adin naupahaia chun, Jonathan naupa Ebed; ama leh pasal sâwmnga.
Elam naupahaia chun, Athalia naupa Jesaia: ama leh pasal sâwmsari.
Sephatia naupahaia chun, Mikael naupa Zebadia; ama leh pasal sâwmriet.
Joab naupahaia chun, Jehiel naupa Obadia; ama leh pasal za hni sâwmpariet.
Josiphia naupa, Selomith nau- pahaia chun, ama leh pasal za khat le sâwmruk.
Bebai naupahaia chun, Bebai naupa Zekaria; ama leh pasal sâwm- hni pariet.
Azgad naupahaia chun, Hak- katan naupa Johanan; ama leh pasal za khat le sâwm.
Chun, Adonikam naupahaia chun, chu chu a nuhnungtak a nih, hieng hi an hminghai chu a nih, Eliphelet, Jeuel le, Semaia hi; anni leh pasal sâwmruk.
Bigvai naupahaia chun, Uthai le Zakkur; anni leh pasal sâwmsari.
Anni chu Ahavaa luong lût vadunga chun ka kei khâwm tâwl a; chutaka chun ni thum lai chu kan riek a; chun, thiempuhai le mipuihai chu ka thlîr vêl chun Levi thlahai hrim ka hmu ta nawh a.
Chuongchun, Eliezer, Ariel, Semaia, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekaria, Mesullam hai mi lutakhai chu kân chah a, Joiarib le Elnathan inchûktirtuhai chu kân cha sa bawk a.

Anni chu Kasiphia hmuna lal Iddo kuoma chun ka tir tah a; Pathien ina rawngbâwltu dinghai an mi hung ṭhuoipêk theina dingin, Kasiphia hmuna, Iddo le a unau Nethinim mihai kuoma an thuhril ding chu ka hril a.

Chun, ka chunga kan Pathien kut ṭhatzie ang peiin anni chun mi lungril indiktak Israel naupa Levi naupa Mahli naupahai laia mi, Serebia, a unauhai le a naupasalhai leh sâwmpariet an mi hung ṭhuoi- pêk a;
chun, Hasabia le Merari nau- pahai Jesaia, a unauhai le an nau- pasalhai leh sâwmhni;
chun, Nethinim mi, David le lalhaiin Levi mihai rawng bâwl dinga an pêkhai Nethinim mihai za hni le sâwmhni leh; an rêng chun hminga ko seng an nih.
Chun, kan thuomhnawhai po po le kan nau-le-têhai le keini ta dinga lampui tluong mi zawngpêk dinga, kan Pathien hmaa chun kan insuk- hnuoi theina dingin, Ahava vadunga chun bunghei ka rawt tah a.

Lal kuoma chun, “Ama zawng- tuhai chunga chun Pathien kut chu ṭhatna dingin a um a, ama nghat- santuhai po po chunga ruok chun, thilthawtheina le lunginsenna a um a nih,” kan lo ti ta si leiin, lampuia hmêlmahaia inthawka mi ṭhangpui dinga sakawr chung chuong mi le sipai pâwl lal kuoma hni kân zak sih a.
Chuongchun, bu chu kan nghei a, hi hi ding hin kan Pathien chu kan ngên a: chuongchun, keini ngên- thlûkin ama chu a um tah a.
Chun, thiempuhai laia a bîk deuhai sâwmpahni, Serebia, Hasabia le an unauhai sâwm ka sie hran a;
chuongchun, tangka le râng- kachak le bûr le bêlhai, kan Pathien in ta dinga thilpêk, lal le a rorêltuhai le, a mi ṭhahai le chutaka Israel umhai po poin an pêkhai chu anni chu ka bûkpêk tah a.
Kei ngei khawma an kuta chun tangkaruo talent za ruk sâwmnga le, bûr le bêlhai talent za khat ka bûkpêk a; rângkachak talent za leh;
rângkachak maihûn sâwmhni, darik sâng khat bûk seng, chun, râng- kachak anga hlu ve bawk, dâr tle mi bêl pahni leh.

Chun, an kuomah ka hril a, “Nangni hi LALPA kuoma inthieng in na, a bûr le bêlhai khawm inthieng an nih; chun, hieng tangka le rângka- chakhai hi in thlatuhai Pathien LALPA kuoma inhâwktaka pêk an ni vawng a nih.
Jerusalemah, LALPA in pin- danhaia, Israel pahnam mi ṭhahai le, Levi mihai le thiempu laltakhai hmaa in bûkpêk hmakhat chun, fîmkhur unla, kawl tlat ro,” tiin.
Chuongchun, thiempuhai le Levi mihai chun kan Pathien ina Jerusalema hung lâk dingin rângka- chak le tangkaruo chuong ang bûk chu an lâk tah a.

Chun, Jerusalema fe ding chun Ahava vadunga inthawkin thla khat- naa ni sâwmpahni ni chun kan suok tah a; chuongchun, kan Pathien kut chu kan chunga chun a um a, ama chun hmêlmahai le lampuia mîn chântu kuta inthawk chun a mi sansuok a.
Jerusalem chu kan hung tlung a, chutaka chun ni thum lai chu kan hang um phawt a.

A ni li ni chun a nih, chuong rângkachak le tangkaruo le bûr le bêlhai chu kan Pathien ina chun thiempu Uria naupa Meremoth kuta bûkin kan inhlân chu; ama le chun Phinehas naupa Eleazar chu a um nghe nghe a; chun, anni le chun, Levi mihai, Binnui naupa Noadia le Jesua naupa Jozabad chu an um bawk a;
a rêngin a zât le a bûkin; a bûk zât chu, chu huna chun ziek a ni nghe nghe bawk a.

Chun, sal intâng mihai intâng- naa inthawka hung suokhai chun Israel Pathien kuoma chun Israelhai po po puolah; bâwngchal sâwmpahni le, berâmchal sâwmkuo paruk, berâmte sâwmsari pasari le; kêlchal sâwmpahni suol thilinhlâna dingin; pumrawhmang thilinhlânah an in- hlân tah a; hieng po po hi LALPA kuoma pumrawhmang thilinhlân a nih.
Chun, lal thupêkhai chu vadung râla lal ram awptuhai le rorêltuhai kuoma chun an pêk suok tah a; chun, Pathien in le mipuihai chu ṭhangpuina an pêk tah a.
